prompt:
Professional advertising photograph.

STYLE: None - Custom Style

POSITIVE ELEMENTS (DO):
High quality professional photography, crystal clear details, proper exposure, accurate colors, clean composition

High quality, professional, 8K resolution, crystal clear details.


5:23 PM
Professional Zippo Gifting Ad Generation Prompt:
Create high-end, production-quality advertisement images for Zippo lighters featuring attractive gifting offers and promotional bundles. The ads should have a premium, luxurious feel suitable for gift-giving occasions.
Important: Do not include any logos, brand names, or store names in the generated image. Leave space at the top for logos to be added later.
PRIMARY PROMOTIONAL OFFER (USE THIS EXACT TEXT):

"Zippo Lighter + Zippo Lighter Fuel Free" OR "Buy Zippo Lighter + Get Fuel Free"

Alternative Offer Variations (if needed):

Buy 2 Zippo Lighters + Get Premium Gift Box Free
Buy Zippo Lighter + Get Zippo Wick & Flints Kit Free
Limited Edition Zippo Gift Set with Accessories
Buy Zippo Lighter + Get Engraving Free

Visual Style Requirements:

Premium Packaging Presentation:

Show Zippo lighters in elegant gift boxes (navy blue, black, white, or metallic)
Boxes should be open to reveal the lighter nestled in cushioned interiors
Include black foam or satin/velvet cushioning inside boxes
MUST SHOW: Zippo lighter fuel bottle/canister as part of the "free" offer - place it visibly in the composition


Gifting Atmosphere:

Soft bokeh lighting effects with warm golden tones
Decorative elements: gold/silver ribbons, gift wrap, tissue paper
Elegant props: wrapped candies, decorative sparkles, luxury table settings, leather pouch
Festive but sophisticated color palette (gold, cream, beige, burgundy, navy)


Product Showcase:

Feature ornate, decorative Zippo lighter designs (vintage patterns, engravings, metallic finishes)
Show lighters in colors: gold, silver, black chrome, purple iridescent, turquoise gradient, brass
Include unique designs: wolf skull motifs, feather patterns, tribal designs, vintage ornamental patterns
Highlight intricate details and premium craftsmanship
Show lighter in open position displaying the inner mechanism where appropriate
IMPORTANT: Include Zippo lighter fuel bottle/can in the composition to show what's "free"


Background & Lighting:

Clean, neutral backgrounds (cream, beige, soft tan, light gray, white marble)
Professional studio lighting with soft shadows
Warm ambient glow suggesting celebration and luxury
Subtle bokeh effects or defocused fairy lights


Typography & Call-to-Action:

Main Offer Text (EXACT WORDING): "Zippo Lighter + Zippo Lighter Fuel Free" OR "Buy Zippo Lighter + Get Fuel Free" (large, bold serif font in white or gold color)
Position main text at: middle left OR bottom left (preferred positioning)
Text should be on a dark semi-transparent overlay or dark section of the image for readability
"Shop Now" button (red/burgundy with gold border, elegant styling, positioned below the offer text)
Tagline at bottom: "Perfect Gift. Iconic Since 1982" (elegant serif font, small, centered on dark bar)
Clean, modern typography that conveys luxury


Badge/Sticker Placement:

"Limited Time" badge: middle right OR bottom right (circular badge with black background and gold border)
Position badges opposite from main text
All badges and stickers should NOT be at the top - only at middle sides or bottom


Composition Style:

Leave clean space at top (top 15-20%) for logo placement - NO TEXT OR STICKERS HERE
Product-focused in upper-center to center area
Main promotional text positioned at bottom left with dark overlay OR middle left
"Limited Time" badge at bottom right or middle right
Show 2-3 Zippo lighters in gift boxes + fuel bottle/canister
Angled or isometric views showing depth
Multiple products arranged artfully showing the complete offer
Balance between product showcase and promotional messaging



Image Specifications:

Format: 1080x1080px (Instagram square format)
Resolution: High-resolution, print-quality
Style: Product photography with commercial advertising aesthetics
Mood: Luxurious, celebratory, timeless, elegant

Offer Badge/Banner Options:

"Limited Time" circular badge with gold border (bottom right or middle right)
Position badges at: middle right OR bottom right (NEVER at top)
NO other badges unless specifically needed

Additional Elements:

Include lifestyle props: leather pouch, gift wrapping materials, decorative ribbons, candies
MUST INCLUDE: Zippo lighter fuel bottle/canister prominently displayed
Maintain consistent brand colors: red accents, black, gold accents
Ensure all promotional text is clear and readable with good contrast
Product images should look realistic and professionally photographed
Add decorative elements like ribbons, sparkles, and elegant props

Variations to Generate:

Single luxury lighter in premium box + fuel bottle with accessories
Multiple lighters (2-3) in display boxes + fuel bottle prominently shown
Festive holiday-themed gift package with fuel included
Minimalist modern presentation with lighter + fuel
Vintage-inspired classic styling with leather pouch + fuel

CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:

✓ Main text MUST say: "Zippo Lighter + Zippo Lighter Fuel Free" or "Buy Zippo Lighter + Get Fuel Free"
✓ MUST visually show Zippo lighter fuel bottle/canister in the image
✓ Text positioned at bottom left or middle left (NOT scattered around)
✓ "Limited Time" badge at bottom right or middle right
✓ Top 15-20% kept clear for logos
✓ Dark overlay or section for text readability
